extendedInfo.description: Today's Free App provides one cool and exciting free app everyday, JUST FOR YOU! Get the best free app of the day service on your Android, FINALLY!We find amazing, beautiful apps and negotiate a special deal to give you special bonuses or even sometimes make these apps free!Bored with same old apps? Find the next big hit with Today's Free App! We help you discover great new apps through:1. Exclusive Deal of the Day2. Staff Choices3. Top New HitsToday's Free App provides apps in every category, from games to music to cooking to driving, so you will always have something new to fall in love with! Discover the next Angry Birds, WhatsApp, Pandora, or Subway Surfers before all of your friends!Find your friends on Facebook or let them know on Twitter about the amazing new apps you've found through Today's Free App!Enjoy the best free app of the day service and download Today's Free App today!

reviews.title: Cool Apps
reviews.comment: Easy access to some pretty cool apps that I wouldn\'t ordinarily look for. Have a nice arsenal of games now & look forward to my daily app.
reviews.author: Jacqui Sheppersn

reviews.title: Best app evah!
reviews.comment: This app has saved me all sorts of money. Some of my favourite games and apps were downloaded from \"today\'s free app\"
reviews.author: Tomas Fernandez

reviews.title: HTC Desire C
reviews.comment: Some of the apps I found on this site I wouldn\'t of found or bought. Some I got for my wee girl to play aswell as for me. Not all were liked by me but most are great. Some were useless to me cos I live in Scotland not USA. I had some already.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Overall it\'s quite good. There are a few pictures I found that weren\'t from the app, though.

reviews.title: Not working anymore since updated my nexus7
reviews.comment: Was enjoying the app until I updated my nexus and it stopped working, please try and fix.

reviews.title: Some nice offers!
reviews.comment: Works well. If you play games on your phone then you get a lot off offers for free games. I have downloaded 3 games and saved about $27.

reviews.title: Ridiculous
reviews.comment: These apps are already free.  Useless, mediocre, poorly designed, and being uninstalled.

reviews.title: Many of the advertised apps are already free
reviews.comment: Awful graphs and layout. Text too big, colours are horrible. But mostly, the ads are useless: many apps are already free if you download then directly through the play store. And the ones that are paid are horrible!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app lets you experience many fun and useful apps.

reviews.title: Neat
reviews.comment: Fun getting to see  free apps everyday. Don\'t need or use most.but still neat!
reviews.author: Jason Bray

reviews.title: Abandoned app?
reviews.comment: For the last week or so the app has been giving out server errors when connecting both on HTC Desire and LG Nexus 4, whether via wifi or 3G. I hope it\'s not an  abandoned app now as it helped me find some decent apps. Ok they are maybe free already in a lot of cases but the price is irrelevant if didn\'t know the app existed in the first place. I hope it starts working again soon. 1* with the errors,  4* when working.
reviews.author: Jason D.

reviews.title: **NEED HELP**
reviews.comment: I really really luv this app..I have found so many apps cuz of this app..BUT for the last few days I can\'t open it at all..plz fix whatever bug is doing this..

reviews.comment: I am having trouble getting into the app to get the free daily apps. It tells me the app is unavailable. Please help!

reviews.comment: They suggest apps that you don\'t even think of such an app. And best of all it is free.

reviews.title: Today\'s free app
reviews.comment: I am really enjoying this app. It is showing you a lot of fun places and good places to eat.
reviews.author: Nalis Wall

reviews.title: Amazon\'s Free App of the Day is Better!
reviews.comment: Like others, I have found that most of these apps are already being offered for free. More importantly, the apps have all been useless so far.   Amazon has been offering a free app every day for over two years, and they\'ve done a much better job at it. Amazon offers a wide variety of free apps such as games, books for young children, specialty apps, phone customization apps, etc. Google\'s apps have all pretty much been the same--apps where the community shares info so users know where to get the best food, concerts, etc.  One last thing that doesn\'t quite measure up to the way Amazon offers their free app--there is no reason this even needs to be a separate app from the Play Store! Why not just offer the free app on the Play Store? You should simply open up the Play Store and see a new offer every day on the home page. Then you can download it from there and be done. It\'s silly to have a separate app that wastes precious on-board memory on your phone, then have it link to a different app where you do the actual downloading.
reviews.author: Phillip Altchuler
